Description: Each shop in Wachumeqimeqi has a list of requested deliveries. XRral Soj Metalwares will accept items from blacksmiths, armorers, and goldsmiths. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log. Next, select Special Recipes from within the requisite crafting discipline, then Class, and lastly Wachumeqimeqi to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your esteem level will increase, allowing you to progress through the story. Wachumeqimeqi Deliveries take the form of collectables, and you are able to submit multiple items simultaneously. Items with a higher collectability do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.
